# isDeviceMotionAvailable

**Instance Property**

A Boolean value that indicates whether the device-motion service is available on the device.

## Declaration

```swift
var isDeviceMotionAvailable: Bool { get }
```

## Discussion

The device-motion service is available if a device has both an accelerometer and a gyroscope. Because all devices have accelerometers, this property is functionally equivalent to [doc://com.apple.coremotion/documentation/CoreMotion/CMMotionManager/isGyroAvailable].

## Related Documentation

- **isDeviceMotionActive**: A Boolean value that determines whether the app is receiving updates from the device-motion service.

## Determining the Availability of Services

- **isAccelerometerAvailable**: A Boolean value that indicates whether an accelerometer is available on the device.
- **isGyroAvailable**: A Boolean value that indicates whether a gyroscope is available on the device.
- **isMagnetometerAvailable**: A Boolean value that indicates whether a magnetometer is available on the device.
